data.title: Roy Webb
data.meta_description:
Roy Webb went up to Guy’s in 1939, and the students were evacuated to Pembury in Kent at the start of the Blitz. After qualifying he joined the destroyer HMS Kelvin as a surgeon lieutenant in 1943.

He was on board when Kelvin provided cover for the D-Day landings and …
